name: Shock Escape
description:
Welcome to  Shock Escape (working title)! 

This is a simple buzz wire VR game that was a result  of a 1 week solo game jam.

For  anyone not familiar with buzz wire, it's a game that tests your hand's  stamina, flexibility and stability.   You hold a metal ring on one hand which you have to pass through   a long wire maze made from end to end. The challenge of the game is that you cannot let the ring touch the maze. If it does, it's game over.

I took  this game concept and added more ideas to showcase what is possible in VR.  These ideas are mostly mechanics taken from existing platformer games like moving obstacles or physics based  puzzles. 

This is a very early version of the game, only has 5 levels and may contain a lot of bugs.

This was supposed to be just a quick project but I loved the idea even more after playtesting it, so I've decided to continue development and add more features soon! 

Thanks for playing and let me know if you have any thoughts   or suggestions! :)
